amendment.description: Amendment sought to reduce the Defense Nuclear Nonproliferation construction and expansion account by $100 million and to apply the savings to the spending reduction account.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 9 printed in the Congressional Record to reduce the Defense Nuclear Nonproliferation construction and expansion account by $100,000,000, and to apply the savings to the spending reduction account.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Burgess amendment (A023) Failed by recorded vote: 168 - 249 (Roll no. 329).
